headline: Jim Cramer Says ConocoPhillips (COP) is the “Best of the Lot These Days”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Talked About These 13 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP)stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. A caller inquired about ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) in light of the budget bill, lower oil prices, and tariffs. Here is what Cramer […]
